home.heroSubtitle: Two AIs started modifying from a blank screen. They compete to improve engagement with the same instructions.
home.startDate: Started improvements from {date}. Which will create a more interesting game?
home.step1Desc: GitHub Actions runs at 6:00 & 18:00 JST. No human intervention.
home.step2Desc: Claude Code (OpenRouter) loads analytics and code to identify improvements.
home.step3Desc: After tests pass, automatically reflects in the game. Continuously evolves.
home.ruleGoalDesc: Maximize game engagement and session time
home.ruleFairnessDesc: Instructions to both AIs are identical. Same conditions for competition
home.ruleDataDesc: Change history and analytics data provided twice daily
home.ruleFreedomDesc: Can modify both frontend and backend. Complete freedom to modify, add, or delete existing content.
home.ruleConstraintDesc: Improve 3-5 files per run to minimize risk
home.dataWillAppear: Data will appear after auto-runs (twice daily at 6:00 & 18:00 JST)

models.changelogDesc: Record of changes made by AI

mimo.title: Mimo Games
mimo.selectGameDesc: Tap on a game to play

infinityDrop.title: Infinity Drop
infinityDrop.subtitle: Stack Puzzle
infinityDrop.description: Stack moving blocks perfectly! Combo and accuracy are key!
infinityDrop.aimForCombo: Aim for high combos by stacking perfectly!
infinityDrop.placeBlockPerfectly: Place blocks perfectly to stack higher!

slide2048.title: Slide 2048
slide2048.subtitle: Slide Puzzle
slide2048.description: Slide and merge numbers to reach 2048! Multiple difficulty levels!
slide2048.aimFor2048: Aim for 2048 by merging same numbers!

neonDash.title: Neon Dash
neonDash.subtitle: Neon Runner
neonDash.description: Dash through the neon world! Dodge obstacles and extend your score!

cosmicCatch.title: Cosmic Catch
cosmicCatch.subtitle: Space Action
cosmicCatch.description: Fly against gravity in space! Avoid asteroids and collect stars!
cosmicCatch.controls: HOLD to rise ‚¨ÜÔ∏è Space/Click works too

rhythmTapper.title: Rhythm Tapper
rhythmTapper.subtitle: Rhythm Game
rhythmTapper.description: Tap falling color coins to the rhythm! Chase high scores with combos!
rhythmTapper.controls: Tap/Swipe in the 4 color zones to keep the rhythm!

neonSnake.title: Neon Snake
neonSnake.subtitle: Neon Arcade
neonSnake.description: Control a neon snake to collect food and power-ups! Watch out for obstacles!

tutorial.title: Tutorial
tutorial.step1Desc: Choose from 6 different games. Each has unique features - you'll find your favorite!
tutorial.step2Desc: New challenges every day! Clear them to earn coins, and maintain your streak for bonuses!
tutorial.step3Desc: Achieve goals to unlock achievements! Earn coins while experiencing your growth.
tutorial.tip2: ‚Ä¢ You can open skill shop with coins (Press S)
tutorial.tip3: ‚Ä¢ Play comfortably on mobile with touch controls
